channel.title: Install on Subversive
channel.description: Recent content in Install on Subversive

item.title: Installation
item.description: Prerequisite Install hugo Make your site Minimum version of hugo 0.74.0 . Install theme When your website is on. You will install the theme. Go in the folder /themes/ and run the command : by clone git clone https://github.com/subversive-eu/hugo-subversive.git To update the theme use this : cd themes/hugo-PaperMod git pull by submodule git submodule add https://github.com/subversive-eu/hugo-subversive.git hugo-subversive To update the theme use this :

item.title: Using tricks
item.description: Hey, I will give you some tricks to make your website.
